name: Traffic Road - Crossy Turn
description:
There is no brake in this game...
Drive your super car through the traffic jam!

Today, in the city, there are too many cars.
You can't drive max speed in the city,but you can do with this game! Because this is just game!

Pass through between the cars with light speed!
Watch out! There are crossroads and walking peoples.
Avoid cars,obstacles and peoples!

-More 40 variety cars.
-Endless random maps.
-Earn coins and collect all cars!
